segments.text: Jane , the meeting is scheduled from 1:00 this afternoon . Have you made the necessary arrangements ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Mr . Miller . We'll use the conference room on the third floor for the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . The meeting is very important . Where shall the guests be received before the meeting begins ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the dining room . It's spacious there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll have several foreign guests to attend the meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've arranged for an interpreter to be present . But it is said these foreigners could speak English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I'll also try to speak slowly . How would you arrange the guests ' seats , Jane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've prepared name cards to be put on the conference table for guests to sit by . What time would you like refreshments served , Mr . Miller ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , after my report , there will be an interval for rest and refreshments .
segments.speaker: S1
